title: Check Voter Registration Status
description: A citizen wants to check if they are registered to vote at their current address.

tasks.description: Gather the citizen's name, address, and date of birth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the information needed to perform the search.

tasks.description: Search the statewide voter registration database.
Inform the citizen of their registration status and polling place location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the citizen is registered and provides their polling location.
